Uses of Interface
pitt.search.semanticvectors.CloseableVectorStore

  • Packages that use CloseableVectorStore 
    Package Description
    pitt.search.semanticvectors
    Semantic Vector indexes, created by applying a Random Projection algorithm to term-document matrices created using Apache Lucene.

    • Uses of CloseableVectorStore in pitt.search.semanticvectors

      Classes in pitt.search.semanticvectors that implement CloseableVectorStore 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  VectorStoreOrthographical
      This class provides methods for retrieving vectors that are computed using the orthographical techniques in NumberRepresentation.
      class  VectorStoreReaderLucene
      This class provides methods for reading a VectorStore from disk.
      class  VectorStoreReaderText
      This class provides methods for reading a VectorStore from a textfile.
      Methods in pitt.search.semanticvectors that return CloseableVectorStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CloseableVectorStore VectorStoreReader.openVectorStore(java.lang.String storeName, FlagConfig flagConfig)
      Opens a vector store for reading, setting flags appropriately.
